definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The experiments also aimed at analyzing the law of the variation of LHP's conductance with heat load.
sentences.chinese: 分析了迴路熱管熱導隨傳熱功率變化的規律。

sentences.english: The mass fraction of the hydrogen in high-purity titanium metal was determined by high frequency induction-thermal conductivity method.
sentences.chinese: 採用高頻感應熱導法測定高純金屬鈦中氫的質量分數。
